_aChangeLog.text: Added new track to the disco
Added a sound to Guess the word when tile is opened
Simplified geometry
Added hints and removed some unnecessary areportals
Reduced file size by ~15%
Changed fog again for optimization purpose
Reduced amount of crates in boats game
Fixed boat game deactivating
Now there are two random vents per round
Modified boat spectating
Doubled the damage dealt by boats
Expanded cafeteria for future plans
Minor overhaul of pool
Removed physical doors because they didn't work well with sv_turbophysics 1
Added vent to the pool
Added place for Gun Toss
Added 2 more boats to boats game (making total of 8)
Added monitor for spectating boats and made area around it more open
Changed pool enterance
Made armory door openable for CTs by just coming close to the enterance
Changed T spawns a bit
Made Simon Says easier to play
Made Letter opener from the back of Guess the word game now activates by damage only (knifing
Deleted missplaced T spawn near Guess the word game
Fixed sound bug with boats game
Temporary removed Tic-Tac-Toe

_sText:
ba_jail_sovietwave_beta6

MAP BY notfoundname
STEAM: STEAM_0:0:235566452
DISCORD: @notfoundname (worst update)

Any feedback and criticism is appreciated!
If you want to port this map, contact me!
For server owners: no need to compress it with bzip2 since it already is compressed.

THANKS LIBREGAMING FOR PLAYTESTING!

СПАСИБО ДРУЗЬЯМ:
- Sovok
- pezdohryakich

СПАСИБО СООБЩЕСТВУ ЦЕНТРАЛЬНОЙ ТЮРЬМЫ:
- CEVAPCICI
- Цветик :D
- ВСЕМ АДМИНАМ
- И ОБЫЧНЫМ ИГРОКАМ!

Games/locations:
- Disco with russian music and 9 colors game
- Swimming pool with underwater race
- Underground to escape from CTs
- T got talent with piano to play on and Wheel Of Fortune (without the wheel)
- Football
- Volleyball
- Jump rope
- Kitchen
- Boat game with 8 boats

Used assets:
- CS:S and HL2 stock and modified assets
- Modified water texture from gm_excess_construct
- Lenin statue: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2425675174
- Assets from https://modding-assets.net
- Swaying effect https://gamebanana.com/tuts/12924
- Old soviet propaganda

Songs:
- Bi-2 - Polkovniku Nikto Ne Pishet
- Kino - Peremen
- Alyans - Na zare
- Agata Kristi - Na Voyne
- Kino - Konchitsya Leto
- Lyube - Prorvemsya (Opera)
- Lumina Solis - Pech Goryachya, A Za Oknom Metel Metyot
- Mayak - Reka
